title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 7651.25 - Medical diets
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 7651.25 - Medical diets

State Regulations

The department shall require every correctional facility to
establish programs of prescription and provision of therapeutic nutrition as
ordered by the facility medical director for all inmates in need of such
programs. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
7651.25

Renumbered from subtitle AA of chapter V
New

York State Register April 11, 2018/Volume XL, Issue 15, eff. 4/11/2018

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
